tool_description: Check if a website is malicious or safe
name: Sus Guru Malicious Website AI Detector API
title: Sus Guru Malicious Website AI Detector API
tool_name: Sus Guru Malicious Website AI Detector API

api_list.name: /api/report/{report_id}
api_list.description: Returns the report details for a given report ID.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sus-guru-malicious-website-ai-detector-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/report/10858"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sus-guru-malicious-website-ai-detector-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
